DescriptionKorean: 시험 괴물을 혼내주긴 했쮜만… 다음엔 어떻게 될지 몰라쮸. 아직 노력이 더 필요해쮝.
DescriptionEnglish: You defeated the Exam monster, but... you don't know what's going to happen next. I think you need more effot. Squeak....

DescriptionKorean: 멋진 전투였어쮝. 더 강해질 일만 남았쮸. 나와 마을은 자네를 믿네쮸!
DescriptionEnglish: It is a nice battle. All you have left is to be stronger. Squeak. Me and our town believe you! Squeak!

DescriptionKorean: 시험 괴물을 겁 주기에 충분한 활약이었쮸! 앞으로가 정말 기대되네 뀨잉!
DescriptionEnglish: Your ability is enough to frighten the Exam monster! I am really looking forward to continuing with you! Squeak!

DescriptionKorean: 아주 훌륭해쮸! 이 정도면 시험 괴물도 놀라 도망가겠쮝! 마을의 평화가 머지않았쮸! 뀨잉!
DescriptionEnglish: You are so great! I'm sure the Exam monster will run away in surprise! Squeak! Peace in the town will come soon! Squeak!
